info.title: MySQLManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure management API provides create, read, update, and delete functionality for Azure MySQL resources including servers, databases, firewall rules and configurations.

put.description: Creates a new server or updates an existing server. The update action will overwrite the existing server.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating a server.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates an existing server. The request body can contain one to many of the properties present in the normal server definition.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for updating a server.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the servers in a given resource group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the servers in a given subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the replicas for a given server.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new firewall rule or updates an existing firewall rule.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating a firewall rule.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about a server firewall rule.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the firewall rules in a given server.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new database or updates an existing database.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating a database.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the databases in a given server.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates a configuration of a server.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for updating a server configuration.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about a configuration of server.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the configurations in a given server.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating a customer maintenance window.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the maintenance windows of a given server.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the maintenance windows in a given server.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Check the availability of name for server

parameters.name: nameAvailabilityRequest
parameters.description: The required parameters for checking if server name is available.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the available REST API operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

SslEnforcement.description: Enable ssl enforcement or not when connect to server.

InfrastructureEncryption.description: Add a second layer of encryption for your data using new encryption algorithm which gives additional data protection. Value is optional but if passed in, must be 'Disabled' or 'Enabled'.

PublicNetworkAccess.description: Whether or not public network access is allowed for this server. Value is optional but if passed in, must be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'

backupRetentionDays.description: Backup retention days for the server.

storageMB.description: Max storage allowed for a server.

StorageProfile.description: Storage Profile properties of a server

name.description: The name of the sku, e.g. Standard_D32s_v3.

tier.description: The tier of the particular SKU, e.g. GeneralPurpose.

Sku.description: Billing information related properties of a server.

administratorLogin.description: The administrator's login name of a server. Can only be specified when the server is being created (and is required for creation).

administratorLoginPassword.description: The password of the administrator login (required for server creation).

sslEnforcement.description: Enable ssl enforcement or not when connect to server.

infrastructureEncryption.description: Status showing whether the server enabled infrastructure encryption.

haState.description: The state of a HA server.

standbyCount.description: stand by count value can be either 0 or 1

fullyQualifiedDomainName.description: The fully qualified domain name of a server.

earliestRestoreDate.description: Earliest restore point creation time (ISO8601 format)

primaryServerId.description: The primary server id of a replica server.

replicaCapacity.description: The maximum number of replicas that a primary server can have.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Whether or not public network access is allowed for this server. Value is optional but if passed in, must be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'

sourceServerId.description: The source MySQL server name to restore from.

restorePointInTime.description: Restore point creation time (ISO8601 format), specifying the time to restore from.

createMode.description: The mode to create a new MySQL server.

tags.description: Application-specific metadata in the form of key-value pairs.

identity.description: The Azure Active Directory identity of the server.

sku.description: The SKU (pricing tier) of the server.

administratorLoginPassword.description: The password of the administrator login.

sslEnforcement.description: Enable ssl enforcement or not when connect to server.

standbyCount.description: stand by count value can be either 0 or 1

publicNetworkAccess.description: Whether or not public network access is allowed for this server. Value is optional but if passed in, must be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'

replicationRole.description: The replication role of the server.

ServerPropertiesForUpdate.description: The properties that can be updated for a server.

sku.description: The SKU (pricing tier) of the server.

properties.description: The properties that can be updated for a server.

tags.description: Application-specific metadata in the form of key-value pairs.

ServerForUpdate.description: Parameters allowed to update for a server.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of operations.

startIpAddress.description: The start IP address of the server firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format.

endIpAddress.description: The end IP address of the server firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format.

FirewallRuleProperties.description: The properties of a server firewall rule.

properties.description: The properties of a firewall rule.

value.description: The list of firewall rules in a server.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of operations.

value.description: The list of databases housed in a server

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of operations.

isReadOnly.description: If is the configuration read only.

isConfigPendingRestart.description: If is the configuration pending restart or not.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of operations.

dayOfWeek.description: The day of week of the maintenance window to start

durationInMinutes.description: The duration of the maintenance window to run.

startHour.description: The starting hour of the maintenance window.

startMinute.description: The starting minutes of the maintenance window.

MaintenanceWindowProperties.description: The properties of a server maintenance window.

properties.description: The properties of a customer maintenance window.

value.description: The list of server maintenance window.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of operations.

MaintenanceWindowListResult.description: A list of maintenance windows for a MySQL server.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed.

operation.description: Localized friendly name for the operation.

OperationDisplay.description: Display metadata associated with the operation.

name.description: The name of the operation being performed on this particular object.

display.description: The localized display information for this particular operation or action.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation.

value.description: The list of resource provider operations.

OperationListResult.description: A list of resource provider operations.

NameAvailabilityRequest.description: Request from client to check resource name availability.

nameAvailable.description: Indicates whether the resource name is available.

CloudError.description: An error response from the Batch service.

FirewallRuleNameParameter.name: firewallRuleName
FirewallRuleNameParameter.description: The name of the server firewall rule.

ConfigurationNameParameter.name: configurationName
ConfigurationNameParameter.description: The name of the server configuration.

MaintenanceWindowNameParameter.name: maintenanceWindowName
MaintenanceWindowNameParameter.description: The name of the maintenance window.
